unnormalised: **Automotive News: A Look at Recent Vehicle Launches**
normalised: Automotive News: A Look at Recent Vehicle Launches

unnormalised: The Indian automotive market continues its exciting trajectory with a flurry of recent launches. Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technological University researchers are closely observing these developments, analyzing their potential impact on fuel efficiency and road safety.
normalised: The Indian automotive market continues its exciting trajectory with a flurry of recent launches. Doctor A P J Abdul Kalam Technological University researchers are closely observing these developments, analyzing their potential impact on fuel efficiency and road safety.

unnormalised: Tata Motors recently unveiled the "Nexon XZ+ (L)" variant, boasting enhanced connectivity features and a sunroof, priced competitively at Rs. 9.5 Lakhs. Mahindra & Mahindra, not to be outdone, launched a special edition of the Scorpio, celebrating its 20th anniversary.
normalised: Tata Motors recently unveiled the "Nexon X Z plus (L)" variant, boasting enhanced connectivity features and a sunroof, priced competitively at rupee nine point five lakhs. Mahindra and Mahindra, not to be outdone, launched a special edition of the Scorpio, celebrating its twentieth anniversary.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Maruti Suzuki India showcased the next-gen Alto 800, promising improved mileage figures exceeding 25 km/l. Industry experts at IIT Delhi are evaluating the claim independently.
normalised: Meanwhile, Maruti Suzuki India showcased the next-gen Alto eight hundred, promising improved mileage figures exceeding twenty five kilometer per liter. Industry experts at I I T Delhi are evaluating the claim independently.

unnormalised: These new vehicles aim to cater to the diverse needs of Indian consumers, from urban commuters to those seeking rugged off-road capabilities. Further announcements are anticipated from companies like Ashok Leyland and Bajaj Auto in the coming months, promising more choices in the expanding automotive landscape, covering everything from electric scooters to spacious SUVs with ample boot space of 600 sq ft. Stay tuned for more updates!
